model

Class SpriteSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.SpriteSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISpriteSet

    public class SpriteSet
extends Object
implements ISpriteSet

    The SpriteSet class.

    Allows the units to store their sprites as a set.
    Author:
    Max Becerro, Ryo SHIINA

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpriteSet()
      the default constructor
      SpriteSet(ArrayList<BufferedImage> sprites)
      the constructor for a BufferedImage ArrayList
      SpriteSet(BufferedImage image)
      the constructor for a single image SpriteSet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCurrentIndex()
      Returns the current animation index.
      BufferedImage getCurrentSprite()
      returns the sprite according to the current animation index, calls getSpriteByIndex() method.
      int getMaxIndex()
      Returns the maximum index of the ArrayList.
      int getnSprites() 
      BufferedImage getSpriteByIndex(int index)
      returns the sprite according to its index ; putting a higher value than the maxIndex will return the first sprite of the ArrayList
      ArrayList<BufferedImage> getSprites()
      Returns the ArrayList of sprites.
      void resetIndex()
      Resets the currentIndex to 0.
      void setCurrentIndex(int currentIndex)
      Allows the user to set the current index to a certain value.
      void setNextSprite()
      Increments the current index to set it to the next one.
      void setSprites(ArrayList<BufferedImage> sprites)
      Sets the ArrayList of sprites to the given one.
      void setSprites(BufferedImage image)
      Sets the ArrayList of sprites to a single BufferedImage.
      void setSprites(ISpriteSet spriteSet)
      Sets the ArrayList of sprites to the one contained in the given SpriteSet.

      • getSpriteByIndex

        public BufferedImage getSpriteByIndex(int index)
        returns the sprite according to its index ; putting a higher value than the maxIndex will return the first sprite of the ArrayList
        Specified by:
        getSpriteByIndex in interface ISpriteSet
        Parameters:

        Returns:
